isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - AUTOMATIC POSITIVE LOCKING TRACTION DIFFERENTIALS (NOSPIN/DETROIT LOCKER) - MAINTENANCE - LUBRICATION

svcproc.title: LUBRICATION
svcproc.para: The NoSPIN differential is designed to operate in those lubricants recommended by International/axle manufacturer. No special lubricant is needed. For certain cold weather applications, use the lightest oil the axle manufacturer will allow to overcome possible sluggish re-engagement of the driven clutch assemblies. Refer to GROUP 10 - LUBRICATION in the CTS-5000 Master Service Manual for recommended lubricants.
